guide.title: Gentoo Documentation Project Roadmap
guide.abstract: A TODO list for the Gentoo Documentation Project

body.p: This page will contain bugs that we couldn't fix immediately ourselves (due to insufficient resources or just plain lack of knowledge on the subject). Contributions in any form are welcomed.

If you want to fix a document yourself you can fetch the sourcecode by visiting the page and appending "?passthru=1" to the URL. This will allow you to download the XML sourcecode. Just make your changes and attach it to the appropriate bugreport.
If you're scared that your document isn't valid XML, don't be. We are able to easily fix this ourselves :)
58651: Request for a Bugzilla HOWTO so that users are well informed on how to submit bugs for ebuilds, documentation and other Gentoo-related stuff.
24325: Request for a E-mail Configuration HOWTO for regular home-users to setup their system to receive e-mails from ISP/Hotmail/Yahoo/... mailservers.
48733: Update on ALSA Guide wrt FM MIDI settings.
54762: Update on ATI FAQ wrt various ATI card updates (such as Radeon 9600).
Update on ATI FAQ wrt the use of Xorg instead of XFree86.
57411: Update on Virtual Mailhosting HOWTO to fix the incompatibility of pam_mysql with cyrus_sasl thingie.
